entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
